revision.comment: replaced {{form of}} containing inflection tags with {{inflection of}} (2); combined adjacent calls to {{inflection of}}; canonicalized multiword inflection tag 'second-person singular pluperfect indicative' to 2|s|plup|ind; canonicalized multiword inflection tag 'second-person singular imperfect preterite subjunctive' to 2|s|impf|pret|sub
